name: International Steel Trade Association
membership: Confederation of International Trading Houses Associations
goal: Forum for the international steel trade, provides steel conditions of sale, represents members' views and concerns to the authorities, assists in determining steel specifications & working practices, provides training courses and a social programme for members.
euInitiatives: Safeguard investigation into imports of steel products; exporting review of the anti-dumping measures applicable to imports of certain organic coated steel products originating in China.
